backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing user profiles, order management (place/update/get/recent), and repair order management (place/update/get/recent) with access control authorization checks and state migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining state upgrade logic from OldActor (userProfiles, orders, nextBillNo) to NewActor (adds repairOrders and nextRepairId fields).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented repair order functionality including navigation, RepairWizard component, RepairOrdersView table, and React Query hooks with high confidence test mappings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, hooks, views, and utilities for both order and repair order management with detailed implementation notes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode variables for jewellery-themed UI including primary, secondary, accent, and sidebar colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference for the jewellery order/billing React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component managing authentication, view routing (dashboard/wizard/orders/repair/repairWizard), and coordinating separate edit flows for orders and repair orders with success payload tracking.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright notice with current year.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header with branding, authentication controls (login/logout with Internet Identity), and optional navigation callbacks for view switching.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Renders a login card with Internet Identity authentication, displaying a welcome message and login button with loading state.
frontend/src/components/StepIndicator.ts: Displays a multi-step progress indicator with numbered circles, check marks for completed steps, and connecting lines between steps.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/Dashboar: Main dashboard component showing order and repair statistics cards, recent orders and repairs tables with status badges, and action buttons for creating/editing orders and repairs.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/useOrder: React Query hook that fetches order statistics from the backend actor.
Displays a table of all orders with filtering, status badges, and actions for creating new orders and editing existing ones, including success message alerts.
Defines TypeScript types, constants, and business logic for order forms including materials, order types, statuses, and weight field enablement rules based on order type.
frontend/src/features/orders/OrderWizard: Multi-step form wizard for creating and editing orders with validation, supporting basic details, weight, amount, and delivery/status steps, with conditional field enabling based on material and order type.
frontend/src/features/orders/useGetOrder: React Query hook that fetches a single order by bill number with error handling for authorization and not-found cases.
frontend/src/features/orders/usePlaceOrd: React Query mutation hook for creating new orders, sanitizing numeric inputs to BigInt format and invalidating related queries on success.
frontend/src/features/orders/useRecentOr: React Query hook that fetches a specified number of recent orders from the backend actor.
frontend/src/features/orders/useUpdateOr: React Query mutation hook for updating existing orders via the backend actor, sanitizing numeric fields to BigInt (cents), converting dates to nanoseconds, and invalidating order queries on success.
frontend/src/features/repairs/RepairOrde: React component displaying a table of recent repair orders with status badges, formatted currency/weight values, edit actions, and success alerts.
frontend/src/features/repairs/repairType: TypeScript type definitions and constants for repair orders including materials, statuses, delivery statuses, and the RepairFormData interface with initial values.
frontend/src/features/repairs/RepairWiza: Multi-step wizard component for creating or editing repair orders with form validation, auto-calculated total cost, and integration with place/update mutation hooks.
frontend/src/features/repairs/useGetRepa: React Query hook to fetch a single repair order by ID from the backend actor with error handling for authorization and not-found cases.
frontend/src/features/repairs/usePlaceRe: React Query mutation hook for creating new repair orders, converting form data to BigInt/nanoseconds format and invalidating repair order queries on success.
frontend/src/features/repairs/useRecentR: React Query hook to fetch a list of recent repair orders from the backend actor with configurable count parameter.
frontend/src/features/repairs/useRepairO: React Query hook to fetch aggregated repair order statistics from the backend actor.
frontend/src/features/repairs/useUpdateR: React Query mutation hook for updating existing repair orders, sanitizing numeric fields to BigInt, converting dates to nanoseconds, and invalidating queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains a React Query hook for fetching caller user role from backend actor; currently unused as profile functionality is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom jewelry-themed color palette using OKLCH color space, featuring warm gold, amber, and copper tones for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Utility functions for formatting timestamps (nanoseconds to readable dates) and weights (stored as weight*100 to display with 2 decimals).
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for extracting and persisting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage support for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining custom theme with OKLCH color system, Inter font family, container settings, and animation keyframes for accordion components.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a jewelry shop management system with repair order tracking, including material types, cost breakdowns, dual status tracking, and completed/pending feature implementations.
